name: Boobs Saga
description: Imagine that you're a young woman with some tasty curves; and it can only mean one thing - you're a perfect sacrifice to the Boobs King! Avoid traps, fight monsters or hide from them, solve puzzles, dance. And remember: the main goal is to save your BOOBS! Boobs Saga - is a satirical 3D action.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: 2.1GHz Intel dual-core and above Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD5000 with minimum 512MB VRAM and Pixel Shader 3.0 support DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Additional Notes: You may need to update the driver for your video card and sound card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 (64-bit) or Windows 10 (64-bit) Processor: Intel Core i5 @ 3.4 GHz / AMD Phenom II X4 @ 3.6 GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 670 / AMD Radeon HD 7990 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Additional Notes: You may need to update the driver for your video card and sound card
